_header: Jesu Christs mild Mother / Stood beheld her son o rood
_description: A version of the Sequence, ‘Stabat iuxta Christi crucem’ — eleven 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

BLAru248.First Lines:
Iesu cristes milde moderstud biheld hire sone o
                    rode…
BLAru248.Last Lines:
…make hus euere with im woneþat hus boute wit þis
                    blud
